summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 1994 FORD F-350. THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE FRONT AND REAR FUEL TANKS WERE LEAKING FUEL. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL MECHANIC WHO PERFORMED A DIAGNOSTIC THAT LOCATED THE  FAILURE AS THE FUEL TANK STRAPS BEING CORRODED, CAUSING THE FUEL TANKS TO CORRODE AND LEAK.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND ADVISED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 11V385000 ( FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE: STORAGE: TANK ASSEMBLY: MOUNTING). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 180,000.
